trans-unit.source: Find the SSL certificate to export (that you downloaded earlier) and disclose its contents.
trans-unit.target: Find the SSL certificate to export (that you downloaded earlier) and disclose its contents.

trans-unit.source: Select only the certificate without selecting the private key, and [export it](https://support.apple.com/kb/PH20122?locale=en_US).
trans-unit.target: Select only the certificate without selecting the private key, and [export it](https://support.apple.com/kb/PH20122?locale=en_US).

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > your backend > **Settings** > **Mobile App** > **Push** > **Configure required settings** > **+ Notification Hub**, and provide a name and namespace for your notification hub, and then click the **OK** button.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > your backend > **Settings** > **Mobile App** > **Push** > **Configure required settings** > **+ Notification Hub**, and provide a name and namespace for your notification hub, and then click the **OK** button.

trans-unit.source: In the **Create Notification Hub** blade, click the **Create** button.
trans-unit.target: In the **Create Notification Hub** blade, click the **Create** button.

trans-unit.source: Before you proceed to the next step, click **Notifications**, to ensure that your notification hub setup is complete.
trans-unit.target: Before you proceed to the next step, click **Notifications**, to ensure that your notification hub setup is complete.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > your backend > **Settings** > **Mobile App** > **Push** > **Apple Push Notification Services** > **Upload Certificate**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > your backend > **Settings** > **Mobile App** > **Push** > **Apple Push Notification Services** > **Upload Certificate**.

trans-unit.source: Upload the .p12 file, selecting the correct **Mode** (corresponding to whether the client SSL certificate you generated earlier was Development or Distribution.) Your service is now configured to work with push notifications on iOS!
trans-unit.target: Upload the .p12 file, selecting the correct **Mode** (corresponding to whether the client SSL certificate you generated earlier was Development or Distribution.) Your service is now configured to work with push notifications on iOS!
